wormbase 0.2.10
  • Reference
  • Changelog

PCR oligo sequences

Source: R/ftp-oligos.R
oligos.Rd

PCR oligo sequences

oligos(version = getOption(x = "wormbase.version", default = NULL))

Arguments

version

character(1) or NULL. WormBase version. If NULL (recommended), defaults to current production release version available on the WormBase website. Legacy versions can be specified as a character string (e.g. "WS262").

Value

DataFrame.

Note

Updated 2019-08-28.

Examples

## WormBase FTP server must be accessible.
tryCatch(
    expr = oligos(),
    error = function(e) e
)
